author: kevinbogner
content:
Hello, I want to analyze fees earned split by clients. 
https://github.com/sigp/blockprint provides data on which client produced the block.
Where can I get data on 'fees earned'? Can I simply get it from Etherscan or am I being naive here?
This should give me a nice initial overview. Ofc then I can apply some filters like for MEV-boost
